name: fanfix-3.1.2
body:
# If you look for the graphical program, you can find the new version here : https://github.com/nikiroo/fanfix-swing/releases

# Version 3.1.2 will be the latest version of Fanfix with a graphical interface

## Version 3.1.2

- fix: publication/creation date formated 
- e621: fix order again
- e621: option to use a Login/API key to evade blacklists
- e621: better metadata

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangahub.io/: a well filled repository of manga (in English)
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP
- https://sofurry.com/: same as above, but story-oriented
- https://e-hentai.org/: a manga/comics website with mostly (but not always) NSFW content, including MLP
- https://www.manga-lel.com/: a website offering a lot of manga (in French)

name: fanfix-3.1.1
body:
# If you look for the graphical program, you can find the new version here : https://github.com/nikiroo/fanfix-swing/releases

## Version 3.1.1

- e621: fix chapters in reverse order for pools
- fix: sort the stories by title and not by date
- fix: expose the story name on progress bars

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show

name: fanfix-3.0.1
body:
## Version 3.0.1

- fix: update for e621 (and it is no more a BasicSupport_Deprecated)
- fix: for unsupported URL, do not errors out with a "file://" related message

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangafox.me/: a well filled repository of mangas, or, as their website states: most popular manga scanlations read online for free at mangafox, as well as a close-knit community to chat and make friends
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP
- https://sofurry.com/: same as above, but story-oriented
- https://e-hentai.org/: a manga/comics website with mostly (but not always) NSFW content, including MLP
- https://www.manga-lel.com/: a website offering a lot of mangas (in French)

name: fanfix-3.0.0
body:
## Version 3.0.0

- new: now Android-compatible (see [companion project](https://gitlab.com/Rayman22/fanfix-android))
- new: story search (not all sources yet)
- new: proxy support
- fix: support hybrid CBZ (with text)
- fix: fix DEBUG=0
- fix: fix imported stories that don't immediatly appear on screen
- gui: focus fix
- gui: bg colour fix
- gui: fix keyboard navigation support (up and down)
- gui: configuration is now much easier
- gui: can now prefetch to cache all the sories of a group at once
- MangaLEL: website has changed
- search: Fanfiction.net support
- search: MangaLEL support
- FimFictionAPI: fix NPE
- remote: encryption mode changed because Google
- remote: not compatible with 2.x
- remote: can now use password from config file
- remote: worse perfs but much better memory usage
- remote: log now includes the time of events

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangafox.me/: a well filled repository of mangas, or, as their website states: most popular manga scanlations read online for free at mangafox, as well as a close-knit community to chat and make friends
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP
- https://sofurry.com/: same as above, but story-oriented
- https://e-hentai.org/: a manga/comics website with mostly (but not always) NSFW content, including MLP
- https://www.manga-lel.com/: a website offering a lot of mangas (in French)

name: fanfix-2.0.0
body:
## Version 2.0.0

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

- new: sources can contain "/" (and will use subdirectories)
- gui: new Properties page for stories
- gui: rename stories, change author
- gui: allow "all" and "listing" modes for sources and authors
- gui: integrated viewer for stories (both text and images)
- tui: now working well enough to be considered stable
- cli: now allow changing the source, title and author
- remote: fix setSourceCover (was not seen by client)
- remote: can now import local files into a remote library
- remote: better perfs
- remote: not compatible with 1.x
- fix: deadlock in some rare cases (nikiroo-utils)
- fix: the resume was not visible in some cases
- fix: update nikiroo-utils, better remote perfs
- fix: eHentai content warning

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangafox.me/: a well filled repository of mangas, or, as their website states: most popular manga scanlations read online for free at mangafox, as well as a close-knit community to chat and make friends
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP
- https://sofurry.com/: same as above, but story-oriented
- https://e-hentai.org/: a manga/comics website with mostly (but not always) NSFW content, including MLP
- https://www.manga-lel.com/: a website offering a lot of mangas (in French)

name: fanfix-1.7.0
body:
## Version 1.7.0

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

## Changelog

- new: use jsoup for parsing HTML (not everywhere yet)
- update nikiroo-utils
- android: Android compatibility
- MangaFox: fix after website update
- MangaFox: tomes order was not always correct
- ePub: fix for compatibility with some ePub viewers
- remote: cache usage fix
- fix: TYPE= not always correct in info-file
- fix: quotes error
- fix: improve external launcher (native viewer)
- test: more unit tests
- doc: changelog available in French
- doc: man pages (en, fr)
- doc: SysV init script

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangafox.me/: a well filled repository of mangas, or, as their website states: most popular manga scanlations read online for free at mangafox, as well as a close-knit community to chat and make friends
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP
- https://sofurry.com/: same as above, but story-oriented
- https://e-hentai.org/: a manga/comics website with mostly (but not always) NSFW content, including MLP

name: fanfix-1.6.3
body:
## Version 1.6.3

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

## Changelog

- Bug fixes
- Remote server/client improvement: progress report
- Remote server/client improvement: can send large files
- Remote server/client improvement: detect server state
- Remote server/client improvement: import and change source on server
- Better support for some CBZ files (if SUMMARY or URL files are present in it)
- Fix cover images not deleted on story delete
- Fix some images not supported because not jpeg-able (now try again in png)
- Fix some covers not found over the wire (nikiroo-utils)
- Fix cover image files not sent over the wire


## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangafox.me/: a well filled repository of mangas, or, as their website states: most popular manga scanlations read online for free at mangafox, as well as a close-knit community to chat and make friends
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP
- https://sofurry.com/: same as above, but story-oriented
- https://e-hentai.org/: a manga/comics website with mostly (but not always) NSFW content, including MLP

## Version 1.6.1

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

## Changelog

- New option (disabled by default) to show one item per source type in GUI instead of one item per story when showing ALL sources (which is also the start page)
- Fix source/type reset when redownloading
- Show the number of images instead of the number of words for images documents 

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show

name: fanfix-1.6.0
body:
## Version 1.6.0

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

## Changelog

- TUI (text with windows and menus) -- not compiled by default (configure.sh)
- A server option to offer stories on the network (experimental)
- A remote library to get said stories from the network (experimental)
- Update to latest version of nikiroo-utils
- Support for FimFiction.net via the new API
- Cache update (you may want to clear your current cache)
- Bug fixed (moving an unopened book in GUI mode does not fail any more)

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangafox.me/: a well filled repository of mangas, or, as their website states: most popular manga scanlations read online for free at mangafox, as well as a close-knit community to chat and make friends
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP
- https://sofurry.com/: same as above, but story-oriented
- https://e-hentai.org/: a manga/comics website with mostly (but not always) NSFW content, including MLP

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

## Changelog

- UI: perf improvement when displaying books (cover resized then cached)
- UI: Sources are now editable ("Move to...")

body:
# Version 1.3.0

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

## Changelog
- now supports YiffStar (SoFurry.com)
- supports login/password websites
- UI: copied URLs (ctrl+C) are selected by default when importing an URL
- UI: version now visible in UI (also with --version)

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangafox.me/: a well filled repository of mangas, or, as their website states: most popular manga scanlations read online for free at mangafox, as well as a close-knit community to chat and make friends
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP
- https://sofurry.com/: same as above, but story-oriented

name: fanfix-1.2.4
body:
# Version 1.2.4

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

## Changelog
- new UI option: Re-download
- fix UI: books are now sorted (will not jump around after refresh/redownload)
- fixes on quote character handling
- fixes on Chapter detection
- more tests included

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
- http://FimFiction.net/: fan fictions devoted to the My Little Pony show
- http://Fanfiction.net/: fan fictions of many, many different universes, from TV shows to novels to games
- http://mangafox.me/: a well filled repository of mangas, or, as their website states: most popular manga scanlations read online for free at mangafox, as well as a close-knit community to chat and make friends
- https://e621.net/: a Furry website supporting comics, including MLP

# Version 1.1.0

The binary JAR has been compiled with Java 1.6.

## Changelog
- new Progress reporting system (currently only in CLI mode)
- fix on e621 for "pending" pools, which were not downloaded before
- unit tests system added (but no test yet, as all tests were moved into nikiroo-utils)

## Supported websites

Currently, the following websites are supported:
